content: no-sew hedgehog no-sew hedgehog ©2016 primarily patterns 1 notes ● this pattern uses tapestry crochet colorwork a basic tutorial can be found here on the primarily patterns blog some rounds in this pattern will require color changes to be made in puff stitches as with a single_crochet the color change is made by picking up the inactive color for the last yo and draw though of the stitch ● worked in the round do not join rounds ● total stitches in the round are given in parentheses ● finished size approximately 3 long body materials & tools 8 yards tan worsted weight yarn worked from nose work plaintext stitches in tan and 9 yards dark brown worsted weight yarn bolded stitches in dark brown 3 6mm black safety eyes 1 as nose round 1 4 single_crochet in magic_ring 4 stuffing round 2 single_crochet increase 2x 6 3 5mm e crochet hook round 3 2sc increase 2x 8 abbreviations us notation double_crochet = double_crochet round 4 single_crochet increase 4x 12 decrease = decrease round 5 2 single_crochet ear 3 single_crochet ear 7 single_crochet 12 half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet round 6 2 single_crochet single_crochet increase single_crochet 2 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet increase 15 increase = increase lp = loop round 7 single_crochet single_crochet increase 2sc increase single_crochet single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet increase 2x 20 magic_ring= magic_ring insert eyes just in front of ears and nose in round 1 on the single_crochet = single_crochet top of the snout stuff the snout slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch round 8 single_crochet puff 6x single_crochet single_crochet leg 3 single_crochet leg single_crochet 20 yo = yarn over round 9 puff single_crochet 6x puff 7sc 20 #x = repeat contents of brackets # times round 10 single_crochet puff 6x single_crochet 7sc 20 round 11 single_crochet single_crochet puff 6x single_crochet 6sc 20 special stitches ear chain 2 2 single_crochet in 2nd st from hook do not round 12 single_crochet puff single_crochet 6x puff single_crochet leg 3 single_crochet leg 20 work into ear in next round round 13 single_crochet single_crochet decrease puff single_crochet decrease puff single_crochet decrease puff single_crochet decrease 2sc decrease 15 leg work 5 double_crochet in same st omitting last yo work one extra single_crochet treat this as new end of the round and draw through of each yo draw round 14 puff decrease 5x 10 through all 6 lps on hook stuff puff work 2 half_double_crochet in same st omitting last round 15 5 decrease 5 yo and draw through of each yo draw finish off through all 5 lps on hook no-sew hedgehog ©2016 primarily patterns 2
